column1: Little Goat Diner////Bull's Eye French Toast (4.5/5): This might be the best french toast that I have ever had
column2: and the bbq maple syrup is also not overpoweringly sweet. The egg is cooked into the french toast
column3: and the brioche itself help to mute how sweet the dish is. The chicken is tasty and surprisingly juicy. Would definitely recommend this dish. -- $16
